millsfield:images_texts:
DESSERT
Fine Cheeses
selected to perfectly complement one another in flavor and texture,
offered with fresh fruit
All Natural Vanilla Ice Cream Sundae
with your choice of sauces, whipped cream
and chopped nuts, garnished with a pirouline cookie
After this service a variety of snacks will be available for your enjoyment.
PRE-ARRIVAL LIGHT MEAL
Hot Ham and Swiss Cheese Sandwich
served with cucumber and tomato salad
Grilled Chicken and Goat Cheese
on a bed of mixed greens, topped with dried fruit and walnuts
accompanied by bread sticks and fresh fruit
Please choose one of the above options.
Chocolate
WINES
Delta's Master Sommelier Andrea Robinson on today's wines - "I've chosen
a mix of classical and cutting-edge selections so you have some fun choices,
all of them excellent. We tested every wine in-flight to make sure it
tastes just as good at altitude as on the ground. Enjoy!"
WHITES
Sebastiani Chardonnay, Sonoma, California, 2006
This wine is absolutely seductive, with full-blown exotic
mango-pineapple fruit, creamy butterscotch oak, a snappy acidity
that gives it balance and lovely food affinity. Enjoy it with hard cheeses,
risotto, grilled fish and shellfish.
FULL BODIED
Occhio a Vento Vermentino, Tuscany, Italy, 2006
Asin per are veto Veerin, us on white steper grape that is
re-emerging in that region. The exotic flavors make it perfect to pair
with fennel salad, caramelized onion pizza, or sausage pasta.
LIGHT BODIED
REDS
Wente Vineyards Southern Hills Cabernet Sauvignon,
Livermore, California, 2005
The Wente family's 100 years of California winemaking experience shows
in every bottle they make. This wine's dark cherry, chocolate, cedar and
violet notes, wrapped in plush, soft tannins, make it a true pleasure to
drink on its own, or with rich beef dishes and fine cheeses.
MEDIUM BODIED
Belguardo Serrata, Maremma, Italy, 2005
This wine is an unusual blend of 80% Sangiovese (the grape of Chianti),
and 20% Alicante. The Sangiovese gives a savory brightness to the
cherry-raspberry fruit, while the Alicante lends a meaty, savory
balsamic-licorice note. It is very complex, layered and spicy -
tailor-made for garlicky meat dishes and cheesy pastas or risottos.
MEDIUM BODIED
DESSERT WINES
Graham 's Late Bottled Vintage Porto, Portugal, 2003
Decadence, decanted. The dense chocolate-dipped fig and spicy plum
pudding notes of this wine are perfect with blue cheese or chocolate.
Or just by itself!
FULL BODIED
Jurançon Prestige, Cave de Gan Jurançon, France, NV
This is honeyed pears and peaches in a glass, with soft floral,
quince paste and candied apricot overtones. Delicious with cheeses,
ice cream, or just on its own.
LIGHT BODIED
SPARKLING WINE
Scharffenberger Brut Sparkling Wine, California, NV
The fragrance of white flowers and baking pastry compliments an
appley-crisp flavor with notes of lychee and yellow plums.
The creamy texture and long finish make it a pleasure on its own,
but it is also delicious with salads, light fish dishes,
salty snacks and hard cheeses.
LIGHT BODIED
